dcterms:creator: K. Honauer
O. Johannsen
D. Kondermann
B. Goldluecke
dcterms:description: The HCI dataset consists of synthetic scenes designed for depth estimation on 4D light fields, providing a comprehensive evaluation methodology.
dcterms:title: HCI Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Rerabek
T. Ebrahimi
dcterms:description: The EPFL Light Field Dataset includes real-world light fields captured with a plenoptic camera, providing a variety of scenes for testing light field compression methods.
dcterms:title: EPFL Light Field Dataset
